title1: Fight your way to the top!
para1: When you can't talk it out over the table, show them who's boss! Take down other families with sheer force and destruction. In this life, nothing is out of the question.
para2: You have plenty of tools at your disposal to take what is yours! Fight it out with warfare, espionage, bribing officials, or take over politics itself. Make sure they know where they stand, capiche?
